actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Saratoga Battle Monument shall be made a national monument.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Saratoga Battle Monument, located at Schuylerville, New York, and such surrounding property as necessary, and to designate this monument and property as the Saratoga National Battle Monument.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Saratoga Battle Monument shall be made a national monument.
